overview: Ashlyn is having an interesting life. Or shall we say, lives? By day she's a horny provocative masseuse in a low-end massage parlor. By night she's a woman of substance, with breeding and a rich boyfriend to match her rich lifestyle. She enjoys the duality until a singular experience changes everything. Paul Thomas takes you back to the story that changed the face of adult entertainment. With hot Ashlyn, sultry Asia Carrera, and lovely blonde Kristina West. Let the parlor games begin.
title: Masseuse II
